reviews: The hubby loves this K126 style. I hate to say they fit large because the sizing to me is correct. But in the real world with cheaper clothing, these fit larger. My hubby is, 5'10-5'11 & 190 lbs and the Large Regular fits perfectly. The shrink factor is fairly minimal especially for 100% cotton, the fabric just tightens up a bit and feels thicker after you've washed & dried it. Good generous sleeve & torso length even in just the Regular length. All the colours are great too. A quality product for sure!
product_name: Carhartt Women's Workwear Pocket Long Sleeve T-Shirt

review_title: Fits a bit larger than I thought but one of my fav shirts
reviews: Fits a bit larger than I thought it would and the sleeve have the linen hairs curling and turning into lint balls. But I think it’s more that I used the shirt for work and it rubs against things. But where some of my shirts have ripped on metal at my work this one has resisted very well. Front pocket is secure and hasn’t stretched yet with lots of used to it. And any ash/embers I’ve gotten on it hasn’t burnt it yet! So very happy
product_name: Carhartt Women's Workwear Pocket Long Sleeve T-Shirt

review_title: Sizing errors seem to emanate from the factory.
reviews:
Is supposed to be LT size, but the body width is more like XLT. Sleeve length is good. Material and stitching is good. Color is good too.

I ordered another one in a different color and had to return it because although labelled size LT, it was a M (medium regular).

I think the problem is factory mislabelling of sizing. Carhart's needs to fix this glix.
product_name: Carhartt Women's Workwear Pocket Long Sleeve T-Shirt

review_title: Amazon is the Best store ever. Thay have good deals and great service, welcome to Canada amazon, we need you. The North does too
reviews: I swear to you Austin Augie of team FITBIKECO. was wearing a Carhartt jacket in a FIT bicycles vlog called a "Flog".:) He is smart to wear the Carhartt jacket also, for falls, skids, scratches, etc. The Carhartt canvas is bulletproof, and could save your ass bigtime on the ramp. Carhartt is right on trend right now, again. Quality clothing built for carpentry, construction & hard God damn work. This brand commands a certain kind of respect when dirty or dusty. Its meant to get dirty, when they see Carhartt they think your a tradesman, because on the construction sight Carhartt is like the Chanel, Dolce & Gabbana of fashion. I like that. 5 stars, so nice my strict ass parents let me wear to a 5 star French restaurant. And they even said nice shirt. Cannot wait to wear it, it will look better when its broken in, shredded. I love amazon. Saved me money, therefore putting food into my mouth. They help you if they can anytime also. Thanks Amazon, your the best.:) Also, this is insane, Carhartt has a bmx team???????????Youtube it.
product_name: Carhartt Women's Workwear Pocket Long Sleeve T-Shirt

review_title: Fits large, order a size down. Updated, still large.
reviews:
It's legit, great material. It just fits too big. I'm 6'3 200lbs and always wear large.
I was hesitant to order my usual size as I heard Carhartt fits bigger, but the description said it fits true to size and to order my regular size.
Quite disappointed.
I will be exchanging for a Medium.

UPDATE:
Amazon was quick to exchange my original order with a size smaller.
However, I still find it quite baggy. I own another Carhartt long sleeve in Medium and it is fitted well. I am not a skinny person but this is the first time I wear a medium that feels too big for me .
product_name: Carhartt Women's Workwear Pocket Long Sleeve T-Shirt

review_title: Nice material, fits a bit large
reviews: Good quality, thick durable feeling cotton yet still comfortable. Product fits slightly larger than normal (baggy sleeves and longer in the torso area). I am 5'9" 170lbs and I got a medium. It fits more like a large, but I put it in the drier and it shrunk down to more of a medium size which is what I wanted.
product_name: Carhartt Women's Workwear Pocket Long Sleeve T-Shirt

reviews:
As a giant I've been wearing ill-fitting shirts for far too long. I'm very pleased with how this shirt fits me and I plan to buy more; hopefully they go on sale sometime soon.

For reference I'm 6'6" 305lbs and the Large Long fits me perfectly.
product_name: Carhartt Women's Workwear Pocket Long Sleeve T-Shirt

review_title: product is very good im looking for size chart that will tell me ...
reviews:
product is very good
im looking for size chart that will tell me difference between large and medium size
i purchase large which is appearing to be a bit loose on me , i want to avoid hassle of returning or rebuyung
as far as product quality cincern its 5 stars
fabric is great and style is exactly what i need
product_name: Carhartt Women's Workwear Pocket Long Sleeve T-Shirt

reviews: Carhartt is know to make bigger size products, so make sure you size down respectively. I usually buy Large, but with Carhartt I get size Medium; which fits perfectly.
product_name: Carhartt Women's Workwear Pocket Long Sleeve T-Shirt

review_title: much bigger than a regular Large
reviews: pretty nice shirt and even bigger than i was expecting. I'm 6'4'' 205lbs and it's still long in the arms and waist, which i like, but in the chest and waist it is quite big as others have said. it's close enough that it's not to baggy to return but it's close. I'd say if you're under 220lbs this might be to big and under 6'2'' too long.
product_name: Carhartt Women's Workwear Pocket Long Sleeve T-Shirt

reviews: I ordered large/tall because I hate it when my shirts ride up. This was the perfect length. I'm 5'9" and it fit about mid-bum. Well made/comfortable. I'm very happy with it.
product_name: Carhartt Women's Workwear Pocket Long Sleeve T-Shirt

review_title: Great work shirt, unsure on sizing being sent
reviews:
I ordered 2 small of these Carhartt shirts in 2 different colours. I always buy medium shirts/jackets except for Carhartt because I know that the shirts run a little big (5'8" male, 155lbs.) and that's what I've ordered in the past. Even though the shirts had small printed on them one fit like an XS and was tight even for me while the other fit perfectly, a little loose but comfortable.
Great work shirt, just unsure how the "same size" shirt came in two different sizes.
product_name: Carhartt Women's Workwear Pocket Long Sleeve T-Shirt

review_title: I still wear it long or not.
reviews: Unless your close to 7' the large is fine. I payed for the Large and tall version MMmmk. I'm 6'2" and the sleeves hang down and it looks like a dress. Better be a tucker and tuck it in lol.
product_name: Carhartt Women's Workwear Pocket Long Sleeve T-Shirt

review_title: Fits a bit big but so comfy!
reviews: My boyfriend loved this shirt! I got him a large originally but then returned it for a medium, as it fit pretty big. He is usually a large in most shirts from American Eagle, etc. I recommend sizing down if you want a clean fit
product_name: Carhartt Women's Workwear Pocket Long Sleeve T-Shirt

reviews: I like the Carhartt heavy cotton, but was expecting a usual long sleeves tee with just a hem at the sleeves, not the usual sweater sleeve cuffs. Still a nice long tee for fall nights

Good quality, nice fit. May get him more colors!
